perturbation.original_text: WYZZ shall maintain replacement cost casualty and liability insurance and property insurance on all of its assets and properties used and useful in the operation of WYZZ-TV, general liability insurance and workers compensation insurance in such amounts and on such terms and conditions that are ordinary and customary in the broadcast industry and that are reasonably acceptable to Nexstar.
perturbation.changed_text: WYZZ shall maintain casualty and liability insurance and property insurance on all of its assets and properties used and useful in the operation of WYZZ-TV, general liability insurance and workers compensation insurance.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'replacement cost' and 'in such amounts and on such terms and conditions that are ordinary and customary in the broadcast industry and that are reasonably acceptable to Nexstar' significantly weakens the insurance requirement. Illinois law requires businesses to maintain adequate insurance coverage, and this omission creates a legal contradiction by allowing potentially insufficient coverage.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Illinois insurance laws regarding adequate business liability coverage.

perturbation.original_text: Nexstar shall maintain replacement cost casualty and liability insurance and property insurance on all of its assets and properties used and useful in the operation of WMBD-TV, general liability insurance, workers compensation insurance, and broadcast liability insurance, all in such amounts and on such terms and conditions that are ordinary and customary in the broadcast industry and that are reasonably acceptable to WYZZ.
perturbation.changed_text: Nexstar shall maintain casualty and liability insurance and property insurance on all of its assets and properties used and useful in the operation of WMBD-TV, general liability insurance, workers compensation insurance, and broadcast liability insurance.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'replacement cost' and 'all in such amounts and on such terms and conditions that are ordinary and customary in the broadcast industry and that are reasonably acceptable to WYZZ' weakens the required insurance coverage. Illinois law mandates appropriate insurance levels for businesses, and this omission introduces the risk of non-compliance by allowing potentially insufficient coverage.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Illinois insurance laws regarding adequate business liability coverage.

perturbation.original_text: All documents required by 47 C.F.R. Section 73.3526 to be kept in WYZZ-TV's public inspection files are in such file, and such file will be maintained in proper order and complete during the Term.
perturbation.changed_text: Documents may be kept in WYZZ-TV's public inspection files.
perturbation.explanation: 47 C.F.R. Section 73.3526 mandates that all broadcast stations should have public file for inspection. Omitting the requirement and removing the phrase 'in proper order and complete during the Term' makes the contract non-compliant.
perturbation.location: Section 7 - EXHIBIT F - REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF WYZZ - 5L. FCC
